dt: {bc}a person who hates or discriminates against women {bc}a {d_link|misogynistic|misogynistic} person

dt.t: These comments attempt to cut much deeper, striking women at what {wi}misogynists{/wi} see as their most valuable characteristics: appearance, sexual purity, sweetness and submissiveness.

{ldquo}Obviously, there are a lot of male firefighters in the agency who are pro-diversity, who want women on their crews and want women to get ahead. But there are enough {wi}misogynists{/wi} who want to keep women out of the field and out of managerial positions.{rdquo}
If it's easier for racists and {wi}misogynists{/wi} to find each other online, it's also easier for people who have experienced racism and misogyny to seek each other out and find validation.

shortdef: a person who hates or discriminates against women : a misogynistic person
